discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
"Use an 18-digit Salesforce Contact or Lead ID (not 15-digit) to map to the subscriber key."

https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.mc_co_salesforce_data_extensions.htm&type=5

Selected Answer: B
B is correct.

questions.question_text:
A Marketing Cloud admin wants to check the status of a Salesforce contact in All Subscribers. The account is connected to their Salesforce org via Marketing Cloud Connect.
Which subscriber key should be used to search for the contact in All Subscribers?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
I have it in front of me :)
Its: Email -> Tracking -> Tracking Reports -> "Account Send Summary"

comments.content:
But it's also available as a Report Shortcut in Analytics Builder -> Reports. 
Therefore A and B are true

questions.question_text:
A marketing manager requests to receive an email, once a week, with high-level metrics in a standardized format. Specifically, the manager wants to know how many emails were sent in the last week.
What location and activity would allow the Marketing Cloud admin to complete this request?

choices.C: Automation Studio: Create a Query Activity to query data from the “Sent” Data View, then use an Email activity to automate the sending of the data.
choices.A: Email Studio: Select the “Account Send Summary” in Tracking Reports and schedule a weekly report to be sent.
choices.B: Analytics Builder: Select the “Account Send Summary” in Reports and schedule a weekly report to be sent.

questions.question_text:
Northern Trail Outfitters requires all subscriber files placed on the SFTP for import to be encrypted.
Which activity in Automation Studio could be used to decrypt the file to prepare for importing?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Use the File Transfer Activity in Automation Studio to move, unzip, encrypt, or decrypt a file. https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.mc_as_using_the_file_transfer_activity.htm&type=5

Selected Answer: A
File Transfer Activity
My vote goes to A. File Transfer Activity, as that also decrypts the files.

Selected Answer: A
Decrypt file is a checkbox available on File Transfer activity

comments.content: srry the answer i vote for is A

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Accordint to offical docs, File transfer is responsible for decrypting SFTP file

Selected Answer: C
I saw that question on everywhere and I am sure that the correct answer is C

comments.content: In Marketing Cloud Automation Studio, you can unzip or decrypt a file found in the Marketing Cloud's Enhanced FTP directory. With the File Transfer Activity, you can securely transfer files from the Marketing Cloud's secure file transfer location, the Safehouse, to a selected FTP location.

questions.question_text:
A Marketing Cloud admin is configuring Social Studio to manage social media accounts.
What prerequisite for configuring Social Studio should the admin consider?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is correct - see salesforce

comments.content: sorry, no: Facebook is an option but the URL shortener a requirement

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
The most correct

choices.B: Contact Data is used for the Decision Split
choices.C: Entry Source attributes are available in Journey Settings
choices.A: Journey Data is used for the Decision Split

questions.question_text:
Northern Trails Outfitters wants subscribers in their Onboarding Journey to move along a unique path if they purchase within the first 10 days of registration. An hourly automation is run which updates the Entry Source data extension with a field indicating if the subscriber made a purchase during this time.
What should be confirmed to ensure Journey Builder directs the subscribers correctly?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Entry Source attributes availability: The hourly automation updates the Entry Source data extension with a field indicating if the subscriber made a purchase within the first 10 days. Therefore, it is crucial that these updated attributes are accessible within Journey Builder. Ensuring that Entry Source attributes are available in Journey Settings allows the journey to access and evaluate the most recent data about each subscriber, including their purchase status.
